definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: Thee essay is well-written with a standard format of legal letters, legal memoranda and briefs.
sentences.chinese: 缇律师信函，法律备忘录，案件辩论书格式准确。

sentences.english: He and Lentil kiss each other on the cheek.
sentences.chinese: 他和兰缇互吻脸颊致意。

sentences.english: The guards saw you with Lentil. Up at the penthouse.
sentences.chinese: 警卫看见了你和兰缇一起，上到顶楼。

sentences.english: Sarah and Tom arrived this morning with little Tessie.
sentences.chinese: 今天早晨撒拉和汤姆带着小缇西也赶到了。

sentences.english: Deerhounds do not stoop to their work like the Greyhounds.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰猎鹿犬的工作与灵缇犬不同。

sentences.english: Tina tried to teach Sandy to speak, but she failed.
sentences.chinese: 缇娜试着教桑迪说话，可ta失败了。

sentences.english: Find Hephaistion at the riverbank and bring all cavalry to the center.
sentences.chinese: 叫岸上的赫菲斯缇安带所有骑兵到中央来。

sentences.english: The whole world and everything in it appeared as the Lila, the sport, of Siva and Sakti.
sentences.chinese: 整个世界和每件事物都是湿婆和萨缇的运动。

sentences.english: Finally, in one race, Tina got the break she wanted.
sentences.chinese: 终于有次比赛，缇娜逮到她期盼已久的机会。

sentences.english: Christina was newly elected to the student council at her school.
sentences.chinese: 克莉丝缇娜刚刚被选进了学校的学生会。

sentences.english: I knew of course that I would never see Nannette again—in this life at any rate.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我和兰丽缇此生不会再见了。

sentences.english: A uniformed guard opens the door, and Lentil gets out. You get out.
sentences.chinese: 一个穿制服的警卫打开车门，兰缇下车，你也下车。

sentences.english: It was the silliest incident that brought Nannette into my life.
sentences.chinese: 一次极傻的意外让兰丽缇闯进了我的生活。

sentences.english: There was also a description in the novel of Nannette, the heroine.
sentences.chinese: 书中还有一段对女主角兰丽缇的说明。

sentences.english: Chikatilo was executed in Rostov on February 14, 1994.
sentences.chinese: 1994年2月14日奇卡缇洛在罗斯托夫被处死。

sentences.english: But that is how I first met Nannette.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我认识兰丽缇的全过程。

definition: name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
